title: These Patch notes inspired me to prepurchase overwatch
body:
Sorry. There are just too many things wrong with this patch. I really wasn't playing much without friends, now I see these damn patch notes and I am convinced I am only ever going to play if a friend invites me. I am not inspired whatsoever.

Mages also aren't in general in a better position. Like really they just aren't. This doesn't make all mages better, this makes very few better and the rest left as subpar.

Ignoring the fact items like maw of BS and steaks BS are still things that haven't been deleted...

Oh and gutting of zhonyas and other mage items really wasnt redeemed either. I am still mad about that.


So here I say it...

WHOOOOOHOO OVERWATCH HERE I COME
